moves.1. e4: Endali is a good friend of mine.I have played him twice before losing both times so I was nervous..He opens up with 1.e4 which is not what he usually plays (1.d4)
moves.1... Nf6: Endali is an avid chess book collector and I heard that he bought books on 1.e4 e5,which is my normal move.I thought it would be suicide playing that.It turns out he did not read them at all.
moves.2... Nd5 3. d4 d6 4. Nf3 Bg4: This is the main line so far.
moves.8... Nb6 9. Nc3 Nc6 10. b3: We are still in known territory.
moves.10... Bf6: Giving the bishop more activity and threatning to win the b-pawn by 11...Bxf3 12.Bxf3 Nxd4
moves.11. Be3 d5: Making the long awaited pawn break in the center.
moves.12. c5 Nc8 13. Qd2 Nc8e7 14. h3: Attacking the Bishop and giving luft (breathing space) to the king.
moves.17. Nf3 Nxe3: I like this move because now I have a bishop for a knight and I can attack the queen by 18...Re8 after 18.Qxe3 or leave White with a backward pawn after 18.fxe3.So I am changing plans.I am no longer attacking the d4-pawn,I am now trying to open up the position for the bishop.
moves.18. Qxe3 Re8: attacking White's queen and moving the rook on the half-open file.
moves.20. Rac1: better than 20.cxb6 axb6 when the d4-pawn becomes a permanent weakness.Also Black could use the half-open a-file to his advantage.
moves.20... Ne7: Moving the knight away because if I didn't 21.cxb6 could have a discovered attack on the knight.Still,I think 20...Qd7 might be a better alternative.since the knight was blockading the pawn.
moves.26... Bxd4: Otherwise the knight might go to c6 and wreak havoc.
moves.28... Rxd2 29. Qxd2 Qd7 30. c6 Qd6 31. Q: Here I offered a draw which endali declined.
moves.32. Re1 Qxa2 33. Qe5: I expected 33.Ra1.I worked out reams of lines against it,but I will post that another day.
moves.33... Qa3 34. Qxc7: Here endali offered a draw which I accepted.However there is still a lot of play in this position.Black has a  weakness on the back rank and the c6-pawn might be hard to stop.However White has to be careful not to allow perpetual check.I also worked lines out for this,but that I will post later.All in all it was a very exciting game.
